Today the Trump admin announced its final repeal of WOTUS. This Obama-era rule is a prime example of government overreach. After years of delays and uncertainty, this is a win for our farmers, ranchers and business owners in Georgia and across our nation. https://allen.house.gov/news/documentsingle.aspx?DocumentID=4160 …
